DOC.brief_summary: The investigators aim to enroll 2000 patients to undergo diagnostic hysteroscopy for suspected uterine pathologies. Women will be randomized into two groups on the basis of distension medium : group A CO2; group B physiological solution. Pain discomfort will be evaluated after the examination.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Different Distention Medium in Diagnostic Hysteroscopy
DOC.criteria: suspected uterine pathologies infertility pregnancy severe hypertension, cardiovascular disease or respiratory disease
